name: 2021 (PositionV)
description:
Welcome to my 2021 project.

A game where your goal is to pick up survival random events and kill enemies along the way.  Powerups can be one helpful resources for killing enemies.

Upgrade your items to make the process easier.

Each in game item will cost (No define cost yet).  Each item will provide you with extra power.

Earn coins by killing enemies. Each enemy will have it's own power. Some will be more powerful then others and also big in size.

Available

The game is available on PC. I am planning to release it to more platforms in the future.

Feedback

You can leave a feedback comment in the "Comment section". Any feedbacks / tips will be appreciated.
